content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do in your free time?
I enjoy going out to a good beer garden with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am a huge fan of mysteries and I love to bake.
Oh what's your favorite mystery series? I have a soft spot for Agatha Christie.
I love Agatha Christie as well! I am also a big fan of Sherlock Holmes and Hercule Poirot.
Have you seen the new Sherlock Holmes movie with Robert Downey Jr.?
I haven't yet but I have heard really good things about it.
It's a lot of fun! You should check it out.
I will definitely add it to my list. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What kind of baking do you like to do?
I like to bake all sorts of things but my favorite is probably chocolate chip cookies.
Yum! I love chocolate chip cookies too. I have to be careful around them because I have a sweet tooth.
I know what you mean! I have to be careful too or I will eat them all.
It's a good thing we have friends to help us eat them!
I know right! They are the best
